name: buds
description: CSS framework following SUIT CSS naming conventions

scripts.copy: cp -R src dist/scss && cp package*.json dist
scripts.prerelease: npm run copy && npm run compile
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && npm run release
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch && npm run release
